captions.text:
Going to a special event but don't know what
to do with your nails? Let them sparkle and

shine with this quick and easy mani. Today
I'm going to show you how to perfectly transform

your nails into your ultimate accessory for
a party, prom, wedding, new years eve, a night
out, whatever it may be.

Start off with a base coat to protect your
natural nails and allow it to completely dry

for about 5 minutes. Then take a silver polish
and slowly rotate your finger while keeping

the nail polish brush still to add a silver
tip on your nail. If you get any on the sides

of your nail, just use another nail to remove
it. Then, working quickly while the silver

polish is still wet, dip your nail into silver
glitter which you can find at any craft store.

Then gently press the glitter onto your nail.
Using a fan brush, which again can be found

at any craft store, brush away the excess
glitter from your nail.

Now as you can see, you will most likely still
have some glitter over your nail and finger.

So, to remove all of that, just rinse your
finger off under cold water and pat it dry
with a towel.

Seal in the glitter by using a fast drying
top coat. It's possible that some pieces of

glitter may transfer to your nail bed during
this. Don't worry, just use a toothpick and

remove any little pieces and give the nail
2 minutes to dry. Then add a second layer

of top coat. Glitter won't transfer this time
and your nail will have a smoother surface

with two coats. Add a thin layer to the very
tip of your nail too.

And that's it! A gorgeous, sparkling manicure
in just a few easy steps. If you decide to

give this design a try, please share your
recreations with me on Facebook, twitter,
and instagram using the hashtag #cutepolish!
Take care and I'll see ya next time :)

title: Use Glitter On Your Nails Perfectly!
